nodes.text: The Brownstar was a luxury freighter owned by Malta the Hutt.

In 1 BBY, Malta used the Brownstar to travel to Jabba's Palace on Tatooine, where he met with his associates Embra and Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Later, Malta summoned the bounty hunters Dengar, IG-88B and Bossk to his ship and hired them to search for the Yavin Vassilika.
